@caballosblancos @EnvAgency idiots!!

@JamieMc76633051 @timthefruit @GeorgeMonbiot @DaveThroupEA @EnvAgency @HelenStace_HWT Hopefully #ELMS will be that mechanism, but until we know the details it's difficult to say whether it is or isn't going to achieve that.

@JamieMc76633051 @timthefruit @GeorgeMonbiot @DaveThroupEA @EnvAgency @HelenStace_HWT Yes, undoutedly. 

I've been a long time advocate for them going as they distort the market. Consumers should pay directly for the kind of farming they want. And where the public gains benefit from farmland without paying for it there should be a mechanism in place for that too.

@ChilternWoods @DefraNature @DefraSoils @NaturalEngland @EnvAgency @Keir_Starmer @CarolineLucas This was always inevitable. Enshrining EU environmental legislation in UK law post Brexit was always a lie. The environment is now far game to the highest bidder.

text: @MMylesHook @OwenPaterson @FarmersWeekly @EnvAgency Do you believe what the WHO says about eating meat and we go Net Zero to accord with the committee on climate change. Rivers naturally meander because they silt up. We constrain that meander when rivers pass through towns but they still silt up. No dredge, it silts up and floods.
